title: Newton90
author: Newton90
content: hello.can anyone tell me please is ledger hardware wallet support still experimental on polkadot.js wallet?i ask because i see notice in UI :Ledger support is still experimental and some issues may remain. Trust, but verify the addresses on your devices before transferring large amounts. There are some features that will not work, including batch calls (used extensively in staking and democracy) as well as any identity operations.and the question arose: is this an outdated warning or actual info?

comments.body: You can read most of the details about Ledger and Polkadot through this blog: https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/360016289919-Polkadot-DOT-?docs=trueAll of the possible details that you need to know might be found from that blog update they've got for Polkadot and its investors that have questions about it.
